item.title: Setup DNS over HTTPS (DOH) on Firefox Android
item.description: Setup DNS over HTTPS (DOH) in a Firefox browser, on an Android device for privacy and security.

item.title: Fix TWRP E3004 Error on OnePlus2
item.description: I have recently installed LineageOS custom ROM on my OnePlus2 device to keep on trying new android versions as they come. While installing/updating the OS, I was getting below error on TWRP recovery screen.
